changes.title: View Plugin Changes API
changes.description: New feature that allows viewing and filtering the changes.json file of the WP ReAct Agent plugin.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can now read and filter the plugin's changes.json file to understand feature history and improvements.

changes.title: WordPress Media Library Features
changes.description: Added comprehensive media library management capabilities including listing, retrieving, uploading, and deleting media items.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can now programmatically manage the WordPress media library with support for uploads, retrieval, and deletion operations.

changes.title: WordPress Posts Management
changes.description: Added comprehensive post management capabilities including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting posts of any type.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can now programmatically manage WordPress posts with full CRUD operations and metadata control.

changes.title: Enhanced Changes API Schema
changes.description: Restructured the Changes API schema to support multiple versions in a single file with proper version history.
changes.previous_behavior: Schema only supported documenting a single version at a time.
changes.current_behavior: Schema now supports a complete version history with filtering capabilities for better AI context understanding.

changes.title: Global Plugin Refactoring
changes.description: Refactored the plugin to be more modular with better feature organization.
changes.previous_behavior: Monolithic plugin structure with limited extensibility.
changes.current_behavior: Modular plugin structure with separate feature files and improved extensibility.

changes.title: Additional WordPress Features
changes.description: Added new WordPress integration features for plugins, users, and site health.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can now interact with WordPress plugins, user management, and site health.

changes.title: External API Integration
changes.description: Added capability to interact with external APIs.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can now interact with external APIs to extend functionality.

changes.title: Initial Plugin Framework
changes.description: First release of the WordPress Feature API framework for AI agents.
changes.current_behavior: Basic plugin structure and WordPress integration with core agent capabilities.

changes.title: WordPress Options Management
changes.description: API features for retrieving, updating, and deleting WordPress options.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can manage WordPress options with proper permission checks.

changes.title: Contact Form 7 Integration
changes.description: Integration with Contact Form 7 plugin for form management.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can interact with Contact Form 7 forms and submissions.

changes.title: Navigation Helper
changes.description: Features to help with WordPress admin navigation.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can help users navigate the WordPress admin interface.
